scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/assets
scripts.copy: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/index.css dist/assets/ && cp node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js dist/assets/polyfill.js
scripts.istanbul: NODE_ENV=test babel-node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover --dir dist _mocha -- --compilers js:babel-register -r should -r isomorphic-fetch src/**/__test__/*.spec.js
scripts.browserify: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs -c > dist/assets/index.js
scripts.budo: NODE_ENV=development budo src/index.js --serve assets/index.js -d dist -H localhost -o -v -- -d -v -p livereactload
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run browserify
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run budo
scripts.prod: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run watchify
scripts.deploy: npm i && npm run build && pm2 kill && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start pm2/production.json
